related_post.text: Is there a builin or module method for getting all divisors of a number quickly?

so_post.text: ```pythonfrom functools import reducedef factors(n):  return set(reduce(list.__add__  ([i n//i] for i in range(1 int(n0.5) + 1) if n % i == 0)))``` taken from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6800193/whatisthemostefficientwayoffindingallthefactorsofanumberinpython
